But <WG1161> directly <WG2112> Jesus <WG2424> spoke <WG2980> unto them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Be of good cheer <WG2293>; it is <WG1510> I <WG1473>; be <WG5399> not <WG3361> afraid <WG5399>.
